lines.text: Evelyn, there is this much to be said for you - you don't just enter a room, you invade it!
You saucy thing - you'd turn any girl's head with your flattery.
You seem to specialize in obscure acquaintances.
Ah Nikola, if only the rest of the world knew what we know, huh?
If they did sir, nobody would get a decent night's sleep.

[referring to Nicola the manservant]
I declare, every time I see him, he's shrunk another inch.
Yes, poor chap, destined for ultimate evaporation, I'm afraid.

[reading a Latin phrase mounted on the wall]
Omnia Exeunt in Mysterium?
